meanings.definition: A decorative motif consisting of a series of right angles joined at their corners.
meanings.sent1: The artist added gammadia to the border of the painting, creating a unique design.
meanings.sent2: The ancient vase was adorned with gammadia patterns, showcasing intricate geometric shapes.
meanings.sent3: The gammadia on the wall seemed to dance as the light shifted throughout the day.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a puzzle of gammadia, each thought a sharp angle waiting to be connected.
meanings.sent5: The gammadia etched into the stone monument stood out boldly against the smooth surface.

meanings.definition: A symbol or character resembling the Greek letter gamma.
meanings.sent1: In the ancient text, the gammadia was used to represent strength and resilience.
meanings.sent2: The emblem on the shield bore a striking resemblance to the gammadia symbol.
meanings.sent3: As she doodled absentmindedly, her pen formed a perfect gammadia on the corner of the page.
meanings.sent4: The gammadia on the banner fluttered proudly in the wind, a symbol of unity and courage.
meanings.sent5: The gammadia pendant around his neck gleamed in the sunlight, catching the eye of all who passed by.
